New Docs

  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about the Restart button.

  • Description: Updates for CAE 2.0 added. Insync Frameformer & Color Format

  • Description: Updates for CAE 2.0 added. Insync Frameformer & Color Format
  • Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/encoding-guides/hdr10-video-output.html#Overview

  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/live-api/references/reference.html#tag/Live-Jobs/operation/CreateALiveJob

Major updates

  • Title: Dimension: region
  • Description: The region_name field mapping is fixed. Reports obtained before December 6 may reflect different values for this dimension. You can re-run old reports and update the values for previous date reports to fix it. The changes retain the same Region identifier, but the number of unknowns in City or Region Name should be reduced.
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/analytics/dimension-guides/dimension-region.html
  • Title: Publishing Videos to Social Media Platforms
  • Description: Choosing multiple social destinations is now available.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/social/general/publishing-videos-social-media-platforms.html

  • Link: https://beacon.support.brightcove.com/references/add-delete-app-user.html
